May 22, 1954 D Glasgow Charities Contest
Glasgow Charities Contest 0 Other
glasgow-charities-contest
None
Paratroop Drill Hall, Yorkhill Street, Glasgow March contest 1st Scottish CWS, 2nd Clydebank, 3rd Govan. Best section 2 band - Whitburn. Best section 3 band - Alloa Burgh. Best section 4 band - RNVR Clyde. Deportment 1st Whitburn, 2nd RNVR Clyde, 3rd Scottish Gas Board. 9 bands competed.
March 13, 2013, 12:29 p.m. March 13, 2013, 12:49 p.m.
1 Cooperation Band Enoch Jackson
2 Clydebank Burgh Band John Hoggans
3 Govan Burgh Gregor Grant
4 Whitburn Band Herbert Kearsley
5 Bellshill & District Concert Brass Dugald MacBrayne
Unknown Result Alloa Burgh Unknown
Unknown Result RNVR (Clyde Division) Mr. Yates
